name: kevin-claude-marketplace123
description: Kevin 的 Claude Code Plugin Marketplace - 包含文檔摘要、Notion 整合和 RFC 管理工具

plugins.name: doc-utils
plugins.description: 分析文檔並生成繁體中文摘要，自動上傳至 Notion AI Documents 資料庫

plugins.name: rfc-manager
plugins.description: 管理 Moxa 前端團隊的 RFC（Request for Comments）流程，包含提案、討論、投票、歸檔和追蹤功能

plugins.name: git-workflow
plugins.description: Integrated Git workflow plugin providing commit → create-branch → create-pr flow with fork cross-project MR support
